description: This file defines a CacheWorkflow class that extends a Workflow, implementing caching logic for responses generated by an AI agent. It includes methods to run the workflow with caching behavior and demonstrates usage in a main block.

classes.name: CacheWorkflow
classes.description: A subclass of Workflow that implements caching for responses based on message content.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow with caching logic, returning an iterator of RunResponse objects based on the input message.
